author: noslav
content: Hi everyone! Pranay Valson here. I've a background in (plasma) physics and machine learning. Got interested in Ethereum in 2018, and initially worked on developing + testing smart contracts for atomic swaps with OST.com, did a few freelance analytics projects on Eth data, briefly entreprenued at joinef.com, now at Upvest interested security tokens and optimising gas fee markets. Met a lot of the community at the ETHCC in Paris last month., one of the best dev conference i've been to. Thanks for all the energy on eth2. ðŸš€
